extracted_sections.section_title: Nice: Cultural Capital of the Riviera

extracted_sections.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
South of France - Traditions and Culture.pdf

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The region's culinary traditions center around fresh local ingredients including olive oil, herbs de Provence, and Mediterranean seafood. Traditional restaurants in Provence focus on simple preparation methods that highlight natural flavors...

Nice offers an exceptional blend of French and Mediterranean influences, with its Old Town (Vieux Nice) featuring narrow streets filled with local markets, artisan shops, and traditional bistros. The city's cultural scene includes world-class museums...

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Local markets operate throughout the week in different towns, offering opportunities to experience authentic Provençal culture. The Cours Saleya market in Nice and the Saturday market in Aix-en-Provence are particularly renowned...
